channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Palestinian convicted in bombing plot is now an award-winning novelist, and free
item.description: Bassem Khandaqji entered prison 21 years ago for plotting a deadly bombing in Israel. He left prison as an award-winning novelist.

item.title: Democrats seek limits on who can serve as immigration judges amid mass layoffs
item.description: The legislation comes after the White House authorized up to 600 military lawyers to be temporary immigration judges and scrapped requirements for the...

item.title: 50 years after the birth of special education, some fear for its future under Trump
item.description: The Trump administration has fired, or tried to fire, many of the federal staff who manage and enforce federal disability law in schools.

item.title: The use and misuse of the word 'ideology'
item.description: The word "ideology" has become a fixture in American political rhetoric, invoked by leaders to cast opponents' beliefs as dangerous, stupid or unfound...

item.title: Belgium rejects EU plan to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine

item.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025
item.description: Amazon Web Services giant tech conference is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

item.title: Trump targets Minnesota’s Somali community with harsh words and policies

item.description: Healtify is adding live conversation capabilities to its AI assistant, powered by OpenAI's realtime APIs

item.title: Uber and Avride launch robotaxi service in Dallas
item.description: The robotaxis will initially have a human safety operator behind the wheel who will monitor the ride.

item.title: Amazon challenges competitors with on-premises Nvidia ‘AI Factories’
item.description: If the product name sounds familiar, it should. It's a collab with Nvidia that combines AWS tech with the chip maker's tech.

item.title: Trump-backed Republican Matt Van Epps wins US House special election in Tennessee

item.title: Federal authorities plan operation in Minnesota focusing on Somali immigrants, AP source says
item.description: Federal authorities are preparing an immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota, focusing on Somali immigrants living unlawfully in the U.S.
